ThankYouForUsingEHR: Vielen Dank für die Verwendung von EHR!
LoadingHint.0:
Wusstest du schon?
Du kannst Rollen deiner Wahl in benutzerdefinierte Teams setzen!
Anweisungen auf unserer Website anzeigen (Link im Hauptmenü)!
LoadingHint.1:
Wusstest du schon?
Du kannst bestimmte Rollen- und Add-on-Combos erzwingen oder bannen, indem du /combo in der Lobby verwendest!
Probier es nach diesem Spiel!
LoadingHint.2:
Wusstest du schon?
Du kannst Namen von Rollen, Add-ons, Einstellungen etc. verändern, indem du benutzerdefinierte Übersetzungsdateien verwendest!
LoadingHint.3:
Wusstest du schon?
Du kannst unsere Beta-Releases/Test-Versionen spielen!
Trete unserem Discord Server bei, um sie herunterzuladen (Link im Hauptmenü)!
LoadingHint.4:
Fehler gefunden?
Melde es auf unserem Discord Server (Link im Hauptmenü)!
Wir werden es so bald wie möglich beheben!
LoadingHint.5:
Hast du eine Idee, die du in einer Mod sehen möchtest?
poste deinen Vorschlag in unserem Discord Server (Link im Hauptmenü)!
Wir werden es für zukünftige Updates berücksichtigen!
LoadingHint.6:
Wusstest du schon?
Du kannst die Ban-Liste aktivieren, um Spieler dauerhaft mit ihrem Freundschaftscode zu bannen!
LoadingHint.7:
Wusstest du schon?
Du kannst Moderatoren direkt im Spiel hinzufügen oder entfernen, indem du /addmod und /deletemod verwendest!
LoadingHint.8:
Wusstest du schon?
Hacker haben normalerweise keinen Freundescode, also kannst du einfach den Schutz im System aktivieren!
LoadingHint.9:
Wusstest du schon?
Du kannst schnell die Spieleinstellungen ändern, ohne das Menü zu öffnen, indem du /changesetting (/cs) nutzt!
Beispielsweise: /cs map polus
LoadingHint.10:
Wusstest du schon?
Du kannst deinen Lobby Tag ändern, indem du diese in den Übersetzungsdateien änderst
LoadingHint.11:
Did you know?
You can set your role/add-on for the next game using /setrole and /setaddon as the host!
LoadingHint.12:
Confused about your death? Don't know who killed you?
Use /death or /d after you die!
LoadingHint.13:
Did you know?
You can use /poll to ask your players a question and let them vote!
LoadingHint.14:
Bored of waiting in lobby or after dying early?
Use /gno to play a simple Guess The Number minigame to speed up time!
LoadingHint.15:
Schwarzer Bildschirm nach einem Meeting?
Versuche STRG + SHIFT + X zu drücken!
LoadingHint.16:
Weiß nicht was deine Rolle oder dein Add-on tut?
Drücke F1 anstatt Befehle einzugeben!
LoadingHint.17:
Did you know?
You can quickly enable/disable roles by typing /os {percentage} {role}!
(This will set the spawn chance of the role to the specified percentage)
LoadingHint.18:
Du hast die Übersetzungsdateien bearbeitet, willst das Spiel aber nicht Neustarten, um die Änderungen zu übernehemn?
Drücke F5 + T
LoadingHint.19:
Chat icon not appearing?
Press SHIFT + C + ENTER to fix it!
LoadingHint.20:
Wusstest du schon?
Du kannst das Spiel sofort starten, ohne auf den 5 Sekunden Countdown zu warten, indem du SHIFT drückst!
LoadingHint.21:
Wusstest du schon?
Du kannst den Start-Countdown abbrechen, indem du den "Abbrechen" Knopf drückst, oder C drückst!
LoadingHint.22:
Wusstest du schon?
Du kannst alle Einstellungen auf die Standardeinstellungen zurücksetzen, indem du STRG + SHIFT + ENTF drückst
LoadingHint.23:
Wusstest du schon?
Du kannst dich selbst umbringen, indem du SHIFT + E + ENTER drückst!
LoadingHint.24:
Wusstest du schon?
Nicht einmal die erfahrensten EHR Hosts kennen alle diese Fakten!
LoadingHint.25:
Meeting not ending when everyone voted?
Press F6 to end the meeting while also counting the votes!
LoadingHint.26:
Hast du einen Freund, der glaubt, alles zu verstehen, und du möchtest ihm das Gegenteil beweisen?
Schalte die Chemiker-Rolle ein und beobachte seine Reaktion!
LoadingHint.27:
The Dev's favorite roles are:
Echo, Penguin, Rift Maker, Bubble, Evolver, Rogue, Vengeance....
and basically all crewmate roles :D
LoadingHint.28:
Did you know?
EHR has 16 different game modes! Try them out!
Switch game modes using the buttons under the huge title in the top left of the settings menu!
LoadingHint.29:
Did you know?
EHR has a unique game mode for expert gamers called Stop And Go!
Give it a try after this game!
LoadingHint.30:
Getting Crewmate over and over again? Didn't get to kill for the last half an hour?
Unleash your bloodthirst in our Free For All game mode!
LoadingHint.31:
Wusstest du schon?
EHR hat einen eigenen "Verstecken" Modus, mit 12 verschiedenen Rollen, die für diesen Modus gemacht wurden.
LoadingHint.33:
Are you the fastest tasker and killer in the lobby?
Then we have a special game mode made for you! Try the Speedrun game mode after this game!
LoadingHint.34:
Do you like the Demon role and its mechanics?
What if we told you, that there's a game mode where everyone is a Demon, called Solo PVP?
Give it a try after this game!
LoadingHint.35:
Did you know?
CTRL + F1 allows you to dump the game's logs at anytime!
LoadingHint.36:
Did you know?
You can use pets to trigger abilites!
Just turn on the setting in Game Modifiers!
LoadingHint.37:
Did you know?
You can make everyone be able to vent!
Just turn on the setting in Game Modifiers!
LoadingHint.38:
Wusstest du?
Du kannst bestimmte Aufgaben in Spielmodifikatoren deaktivieren!
LoadingHint.39:
Did you know?
You can change the zipline travel duration on The Fungle in Mod Settings!
LoadingHint.40:
Wusstest du schon?
Ich Wette du wusstest das nicht
LoadingHint.41:
Did you know?
'at least' is 2 words, not 1
LoadingHint.43: Wusstest du, dass du nicht alles wissen kannst?
LoadingHint.44:
Wusstest du schon?
Die Lieblings-Nummer des Devs ist 44
LoadingHint.45:
Did you know that you can use the yield statement in an iterator to provide the next value or signal the end of an iteration in a loop since async doesn't work in BepInEx?
Yeah, me neither

FortuneTellerCheck.Vent: {0} seems to have an obsession with using vents.
FortuneTellerCheck.Target: {0} seems to have their eye on someone specific.

SkeldChance: Chance that the map is <color=#66a186>The Skeld</color>
MiraChance: Chance that the map is <color=#e84b56>MIRA HQ</color>
DleksChance: Chance that the map is <color=#66a186>dlekS ehT</color>
FungleChance: Chance that the map is <color=#ffa646>The Fungle</color>
PlayerExemptedFromAFK: {0} was exempted from AFK detection for 1 game
StarspawnInfoLong: (Neutrals): As the Starspawn, you can isolate players by using your kill button on them. Only evil players can interact with isolated players. Once in a game, you can call daybreak in a meeting by typing /daybreak in the chat. This will prevent ALL meeting abilities from being used in that meeting. This includes guessing, judging, and all other meeting abilities that are role-specific. You win if crewmates lose.
StarspawnUsedDayBreak: <#ff0000>⚠</color> <#ffff00>Daybreak has been called by the {0}!</color> <#ff0000>⚠</color>\nThis means that NO meeting abilities can be used in this meeting anymore.
SpiritInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Spirit, you can place candles on players to swap interactions between them using your shapeshift menu. If an interaction were to happen on one of the players, it will instead happen to the other. This includes normal kills. If one of them die or disconnect, the swap will break and you gain back a candle, which you can reuse. Swapped players know they are swapped with someone, but not who.

You win if crewmates lose.
SpiritTarget: <#ffff44>You were swapped with someone by the {0}!</color>
SpiritTargetNone: 0/2 targets set\n<size=80%>Use your shapeshift menu to set targets</size>
SpiritTargetOne: <#ffff44>1/2</color> targets set ({0})\n<size=80%>Use your shapeshift menu to set the second target</size>
SpiritTargetBoth: <#00ff00>2/2 targets set</color>\n<size=80%>Interactions between {0} and {1} are swapped</size>
SeamstressInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Seamstress, you can sew 2 players together using your shapeshift menu. If an interaction happens on one of the players, it will happen to both of them. If one of them die or disconnect, or a meeting is called, the sew will break. Sewed players know they are sewed together with someone, but not who.

You win if crewmates lose.
SewedBySeamstress: <#ffff44>You were sewed together with someone by the {0}!</color>
MagistrateInfo: Call Court to Coordinate With Evils
MagistrateInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Magistrate, you can call court once in the game. The next meeting will look like this:
-Everyone will be gray
-You will have the name COURT, others will have the name JURY
-You will have extra votes

You win if crewmates lose.
NoWhisperDuringCourt: <#ff0000>X</color> The /whisper command is disabled during court.
AuditorInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Auditor, you can check players by using your kill button on them. You will see their role and:
- Steal 1 or all ability uses from them (depending on the settings) if you're in auditing mode
- Lower their vision temporarily if you're in smokebombing mode

You win if crewmates lose.
WaspInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Wasp, you can sting players by using your kill button on them. If the player has a kill button they will die after a few seconds. Otherwise, they will have a ◀ next to their name in the next meeting. They will die after the meeting if the wasp isn't ejected.

When someone tries to kill you, you may evade the kill based on the host's settings. If so, 2 things can happen:
1. You become aggressive and go into swarm mode with no kill cooldown for some time.
2. You get pest controlled. This will daze you, Stunting your vision, speed and ability to sting for some time.
Note: If you evade a kill, you cannot evade kills, sabotage or vent for the rest of that round.
Wasp.SwarmModeSuffix: <#ffff00>You've been attacked and entered swarm mode for {0} seconds!</color>
WaspStungPlayersMessage: {0} has/have been stung!\nThey will die after the meeting if the {1} isn't dead or ejected by then!
OccultistInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Occultist, you have 2 modes: reporting and reviving. In report mode, you report bodies normally. In revive mode, when you press report on someone's body, you'll revive them and they'll turn into Renegade / get the Madmate add-on (if they weren't an impostor).
Occultist.ReviveTime: Delay between pressing report and the player being revived
Occultist.RevivedPlayersBodiesCanBeRepor: Revived players' bodies can be reported
RevivedByOccultist: <#ffff00><size=150%>You've been revived by the <color=#ff1919>Occultist</color>!</size>\nYou are now on the <color=#ff1919>Impostor</color> team.</color>
LonerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Loner, you can freely select your impostor partner using your shapeshift menu in a meeting or the /select {id} {role} command (replace {id} with the player's ID, and {role} with the name of the role you want them to get). If you use the shapeshift menu, it will assign them a random enabled impostor role. The role change takes effect after the meeting.
Loner.Picked: <#00ff00>✓ <#00ffa5>You've picked {0} to be your partner! Their role will be {1}.
ThanosInfoLong:
(Neutral):
Als Thanos ist es deine Aufgabe alle Infinity-Steine zu sammeln und/oder alle zu töten. Zufällige Spieler (du weißt nicht wer) haben in diesem Spiel die Steine. Töte sie, die Steine an dich zu reißen. Verwandle dich, verschwinde oder streichel dein Haustier um die verschiedenen Steine anzuwenden. Jeder Stein hat einen anderen Effekt.

<size=70%>Raumstein: Dein nächster Mord hinterlässt keine Leiche und kann nicht durch Schilde aufgehalten werden.
Gedankenstein: Macht dich Immun gegen gegen Kontroll-Fähigkeiten
Realitätsstein: Gibt dir ein Schild.
Machtstein: Nach deinem nächsten Kill ist deine Abklingzeit signifikant kürzer.
Zeitstein: Verlangsamt jeden, außer dir.
Seelenstein: Gibt dir einen Pfleif, der zu jemandem zeigt, der einen Infinity-Stein trägt.</size>
Thanos.FirstKillAlwaysSoulStone: Der erste Infinity-Stein ist immer der Seelenstein
Thanos.PowerStoneKillsIgnoreShields: Kills mit dem Machtstein Ignorieren Schilde
Thanos.CanWinAfterCollectingAllStones: Kann nach dem Sammeln aller Infinity-Steine gewinnen
SwapsterInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Swapster, you can select 2 players using your shapeshift menu to swap them.
KidnapperInfo: TP Players to you by shifting into them
KidnapperInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Kidnapper, when you shapeshift into someone, they teleport to you.
KamikazeInfo: Mark Players That Die With You
KamikazeInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Kamikaze, you can mark players by clicking your kill button once on them. When you die, all players that you marked will also die. You can kill normally by double clicking your kill button on someone.
RandomizerInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
This is basically a full chaotic role. Random events happen to you or to every player every X seconds. These effects can range from anything like super speed, through inverted controls and sniper shots all the way to time bombs and complete blindness.

Have fun!
- The Dev
RandomizerNotifyOpt: Notify When RNG Event Happens (turn off if events are frequent)
MarshallCanBeGuessedOnTaskCompletion: Can be Guessed on Task Completion
DoesntSpawnOnFungle: Doesn't Spawn When the Map is <color=#ffa646>Fungle</color>
BlackmailerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Blackmailer, you can blackmail players by clicking your kill button once on them. Blackmailed players' votes will be forced to be the same as your vote. Double click to kill normally.
DumpLogAfterGameEnd: Dump Log After Each Game End (Recommended)
DGResetTimer: If Resetting Skin by Timer, Reset Skin After
JailorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Jailor, use your kill button to lock a player in jail. Jailed players cannot be guessed or judged and jailed players can only guess Jailor.
JailorTargetAlreadySelected: You have already selected a target
CantGuessJailed: You can not guess the target
JailedCanOnlyGuessJailor: You have been jailed. You can only guess Jailor.
CanNotTrialJailed: You can not trial the target.
CanNotTrialProtected: You can not trial protected players.
notifyJailedOnMeeting: Verhafteten Spieler benachrichtigen, wenn Besprechung beginnt
JailedNotifyMsg: You have been locked up in Jail by the Jailor. No one can guess or judge you and you can only guess Jailor.
CommitedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Commited, you get a random target at the start of every meeting. They will have a ⌆ symbol next to their name. If you vote for the same player as your target, your kill cooldown will be reduced. Skips may be ignored.
CarInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Car, you can drive around the map. Everyone sees you as a car, including yourself. When you touch someone, you propel them far away in the direction you were driving. This role has absolutely no purpose other than to have fun.
ShiftguardInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Shiftguard, when someone shapeshifts or unshifts, you will be notified
InsightInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Insight, every time you complete a task, you'll know a random role that someone has in the current game.
You cannot get the same player's role twice.
You must remember the roles you know, as you cannot check them after!
TunnelerInfo: Mark a position and TP back there
TunnelerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Tunneler, you may mark a position by petting, and then you can teleport back to the marked position by petting again.
DetourInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nAs the Detour, all kill button related actions on you will be blocked and instead happen on the closest player to you.
TelecommunicationInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Telecommunication, you are notified when anyone uses cameras, vitals, doorlogs, or admin. Depending on settings, you may also have the ability to open closed doors by venting/petting your pet.
WerewolfInfo: Nutze einen Schacht um Amok zu laufen
WerewolfInfoLong: (Neutrale):\nAls Werwolf kannst du durch das Betreten eines Schachts Amok laufen. Während du Amok läufst, hast du eine sehr kurze Abklingzeit für Tötungen. Wenn du nicht Amok läufst, kannst du nicht töten. Amok laufen hat eine Abklingzeit und eine begrenzte Dauer.
WWRampageCDAfterNoKillRampage: Rampage Cooldown After Rampaging Without Killing
ResetToNormalCooldownAfterMeetings: Reset Rampage Cooldown to Normal After Meetings
YinYangerInfo: Make 2 players meet each other to kill them!
YinYangerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Yin Yanger, you may yin yang two players after each meeting. After marking the two players, you can kill normally. When the two yin yanged players go within kill distance of each other, they both suicide.
DuellistInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Duellist, you can shapeshift into someone to teleport them and you next to each other outside the map. You will both be there until one of you die.
SwiftclawInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Swiftclaw, you can pet to dash, which makes you go faster for a set amount of seconds.
CantankerousInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Cantankerous, you can only kill if you have a point. You gain points if a non-impostor player gets ejected.
CantankerousPointsGainedPerEjection: Points Gained Per Non-Impostor Player Ejected
DruidInfo: Place Triggers to Know Where Everyone Is
DruidInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Druid, you may vent, and after a delay, place a trigger where you stand. If any player walks closely by your trigger, you will be notified.
Place your triggers where only impostors go, and catch them!

Note: If the setting to use pets is on, you can place triggers immediately by petting.
DruidTriggerPlaceDelayOpt: Trigger Place Delay (when not using pets)
MafiosoInfo: With Each Tier, you're more Powerful
MafiosoInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Mafioso, you gain XP by killing, sabotaging, entering a vent you haven't entered that round yet, or by seeing a player not on your team get ejected. When you have 100 XP, your tier levels up. With each tier, you get progressively more powerful:

Tier 0: Regular impostor, higher kill cooldown, short kill range
Tier 1: Long kill range, normal kill cooldown
Tier 2: Lower kill cooldown
Tier 3: Dual pistols: you have 2 separate higher kill cooldowns, if at least one of them is up, you can kill!
Tier 4: Normal kill cooldown on both pistols
Tier 5: Delayed kills
MafiosoRewardForKilling: XP Gained for Getting a Kill
MafiosoRewardForSabotaging: XP Gained for Calling a Sabotage
MafiosoRewardForVenting: XP Gained for Entering a Unique Vent
MafiosoRewardForOtherPlayerEjected: XP Gained When a Non-Impostor Player Gets Ejected
WhispererInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Whisperer, you can ask the souls of dead players for information. You'll see the souls of the players who have died (after the next meeting) and can question them by petting on them. You have to stay near the soul for a few seconds. You then get random details on the soul or the killer shown below your name.
WhispererInfo.Time: I died {0} seconds before the meeting started
WhispererInfo.AloneInRoomAtDeath: I was alone with the killer when I died
WhispererInfo.PlayersInSameRoomAtDeath: {0} were in the same room as me when I died
WhispererInfo.NoSabotageAtDeath: No sabotage was ongoing when I died
LeeryInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Leery, if you stand near someone for a few seconds (set by the host) (they must be the nearest player for the entire duration), and they're not a crewmate, you'll be notified.
Leery.Radius: Maximum Distance to Stand Near Someone
LeeryNotify: <#ffff00>The nearest player is not a crewmate!</color>
AnkylosaurusInfo: Du bist ein Ankylosaurus.... glaube ich
AnkylosaurusInfoLong: (Besatzung):\nAls Ankylosaurus, kann deine Rolle nicht erraten werden. Du bewegst dich langsamer und eine geringere Sicht. Dafür hast du aber mehrere Leben.
GuessAnkylosaurus: Du kannst den Ankylosaurus nicht erraten
HypnotistInfoLong: (Verräter):\n Als Hypnotiseur kannst du alle Spieler davon abhalten, Leichen zu melden, wenn du deine Fähigkeit nutzt, indem du die Schächte nutzt oder dein Haustier streichelst.
Hypnotist.DoReportAfterHypnosisEnds: Prozessberichte, die während der Hypnose blockiert wurden, nachdem die Hypnose abgelaufen ist
BaneInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Bane, if an impostor kills you, they will lose their abilities and become a regular impostor or shapeshifter.
TransmitterInfo: TP to nearest player by doing a task
TransmitterInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Transmitter, when you complete a task, you teleport to the nearest player.
AdrenalineInfo: Be Fast Enough to Avoid Kills
AdrenalineInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Adrenaline, when you get attacked, the killing attempt gets blocked and you receive a timer. If a meeting gets called before the timer ends, you survive. Otherwise, you die when the timer ends.

Depending on the settings, you may or may not know be able to call emergency meetings during the timer.
Adrenaline.Time: Time for a Meeting to Start
Adrenaline.MinTasksRequired: Minimum Tasks Required to Survive an Attack
Adrenaline.CanCallMeetingDuringTimer: Can Call Emergency Meetings During the Timer
Adrenaline.Suffix: <size=80%><#ffff00>You were attacked!\nIf a meeting doesn't start before <#ffffff>{0}s</color>, you die!</color></size>
SentryInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Als Security, kannst du einen Raum überwachen, indem du dein Haustier streichelst. Wenn du das Streicheln wiederholst, erhältst du Informationen über diesen Raum. Das beinhaltet: <size=80%>
-Die Spieler, die zu diesem Zeitpunkt in diesem Raum sind.</size>
Du bekommst auch eine Benachtrichtigung, wenn sich jemand in diesem Raum Verwandelt oder die Schächte nutzt.
Sentry.PlayersKnowAboutCamera: Spieler wissen, ob der Raum überwacht wird
Sentry.CannotSeeInfoDuringComms: Info kann während Comms-Sabotage nicht angezeigt werden
Sentry.Notify.Shapeshifted: {0} hat sich im überwachten Raum zu {1} verwandelt
Sentry.Notify.Vented: {0} hat im überwachten Raum die Schächte genutzt
Sentry.UsableDevicesForInfoView: Geräte, die die Spieler nutzen können, um Informationen über den überwachten Raum zu erhalten
Sentry.AdditionalDevicesForInfoView: Kartenspezifische Geräte, die Spieler verwenden können, um Informationen über den überwachten Raum zu erhalten
MurderMaxGame: You've reached your maximum murders limit for this game, so it was blocked.
DynamoInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Dynamo, you get faster by walking. The longer you walk, the faster you get. Stopping will reset your speed.
SamuraiInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Samurai, you can do delayed kills and normal kills. What decides? Well, if you click your kill button on someone (the kill won't occur immediately) and you stay near them for a few seconds (like an arsonist douse), you get a lower kill cooldown and the kill will be delayed. If you fail to stay near them, you do a normal kill, lunge included.
Samurai.NearbyDuration: Zeit in der Nähe vom Ziel zu bleiben
OverheatInfo: je heißer es ist, desto geringer ist deine Kill-Abklingzeit
OverheatInfoLong: Als Überhitzender basiert deine Abklingzeit für Kills auf deiner Temperatur. Je länger du wartest, desto heißer wirst du und desto kürzer wird deine Abklingzeit für Kills, aber auch die Wahrscheinlichkeit einer Überhitzung steigt. Du kannst dich verwandeln oder dein Haustier streicheln, um dich abzukühlen und deine Temperatur zurückzusetzen. Dadurch wirst du für einige Sekunden an Ort und Stelle eingefroren.
QuizMasterInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Quiz Master, you can ask questions to players. If they answer correctly, nothing happens. If they answer incorrectly, they die.

Kill everyone to win!

<u>Notes:</u>
- The Quiz Master gets sent a copy of the question message sent to their target
- The Quiz Master can single click with their kill button on someone to mark them as their target and thus ask them a question in the next meeting, or double click to kill them normally.
QuizMaster.Title: Quiz-Master Frage
QuizMaster.QuestionSample.Title: Der Quiz-Master fragt dich
QuizMaster.Question.1: Welche Farbe hatte die Leiche, die zuletzt reportet wurde?
QuizMaster.Question.2: Wer war die letzte Person, die den Notfall-Meeting Knopf gedrückt hat?
QuizMaster.Question.3: Was war die letzte Sabotage, die gestartet wurde?
QuizMaster.Question.4: Was war die Rolle des zuletzt rausgeworfenen Spielers?
QuizMaster.Question.5: Wer hat die Leiche im letzten Meeting reportet?
QuizMaster.Question.6: How many players voted last meeting (excluding hidden/extra votes)?
QuizMaster.Question.7: How many meetings did we have so far?
QuizMaster.Question.8: Whose body was reported first in the game?
QuizMaster.Question.9: How many people pressed the emergency button so far <size=80%>(including this meeting if it's a button)</size>?
QuizMaster.Question.10: How many players died in this round?
QuizMaster.Question.11: How many players died in the first round?
QuizMaster.Question.12: How many sabotages were called so far?
QuizMaster.Question.13: How many tasks are currently completed?
QuizMaster.Question.ABC.1: What faction killed the last victim that got reported?
QuizMaster.Question.ABC.2: How did the last victim that got reported die?
QuizMaster.Question.ABC.3: Which Among Us mod has the most amount of roles?
QuizMaster.Question.ABC.4: Who is the main developer of EHR?
QuizMaster.AnswerCorrect.Self: Your target answered the question correctly. ({0})
QuizMaster.AnswerIncorrect.Self: Your target answered incorrectly. They chose {0}, while the correct option was {1}.
BargainerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Bargainer, you can gain money by killing, sabotaging and surviving meetings. You can use this money to buy some items from the shop. All devices on this map represent a shop you can use by going near it. You can buy the following items:<size=80%>
- Energy Drink (lowers your kill cooldown for that round)
- Lens Of Truth (reveals a random player's role for some time)
- Band Aid (gives you a shield for some time)</size>
When you step away from a shop, the selected item will be purchased if you have enough money for it. You can choose to not buy anything. While in the shop, sabotage to cycle between the available items.
Bargainer.Kill.Enabled: Gewinn Sie Geld für das Töten
Bargainer.SurviveMeeting.Enabled: Gewinn Sie Geld für überlebende Treffen
ChemistInfoLong:
Als Chemiker mischst du alle möglichen Chemikalien, um übermächtige Gase und Gegenstände herzustellen. Jeder Raum auf dem Raumschiff fungiert als eine Art Fabrik. In jeder Fabrik kannst du bestimmte Prozesse durchführen, bei denen du Zutaten verwendest und Ergebnisse erhältst. (Einige Fabriken bieten mehrere Prozesse an, sabotiere, um zwischen ihnen zu wechseln.) (Du kannst die Schächte nutzen, um einige Grundzutaten zu erhalten.) (Streichle dein Haustier, um einen Prozess abzuschließen, wenn du die erforderlichen Zutaten hast.)

Arbeite dich vor, um diese Endprodukte zu erhalten, die Folgendes bewirken:
- Schwefelsäure: Markiere jemanden mit dem Kill-Knopf, und dieser Spieler verbreitet die Säure an alle Spieler in seiner Nähe. Nach einiger Zeit sterben alle Spieler, die mit Säure in Kontakt gekommen sind.
- Methylamingas: Nutze die Schächte um alle außer dir zu blenden.
- Sprengstoff: Wird auf die nächste Leiche gelegt, die du hinterlässt. Jeder, der versucht, diese zu melden, stirbt.
- Granate: Lege diese durch den Kill-Knopf auf jemanden. Dieser trägt nun die Granate bei sich. Die Granate explodiert innerhalb von Sekunden und tötet diesen Spieler und alle in seiner Nähe.

 Wenn du ein Endprodukt hast, das über den Kill-Button einsatzbereit ist, klicke einmal, um es zu verwenden, und zweimal, um normal zu töten. 

<size=80%>Dies ist bei weitem die komplexeste Rolle in der Geschichte von Among Us. Viel Glück! (- Der Entwickler)</size>
Chemist.Item.Explosive.Usage: Menge an verlorenen Sprengstoff bei Verwendung
Chemist.Item.Grenade.Usage: Anzahl der verlorenen Granaten bei Verwendung
Chemist.Item.SulfuricAcid.Usage: Menge an verlorener Schwefelsäure bei Verwendung
Chemist.Item.MethylamineGas.Usage: Menge an verlorenen Methylamin-Gas bei Verwendung
Chemist.AirGainedPerSecond: Menge an Luft, die jede Sekunde erhalten wird
Chemist.WaterGainedPerSecond: Menge an Wasser, die jede Sekunde erhalten wird
Chemist.CoalGainedPerVent: Menge an Kohle, die jede Sekunde erhalten wird
Chemist.IronOreGainedPerVent: Menge an Eisenerz, die jede Sekunde erhalten wird
Chemist.AcidPlayersDie: Spieler die mit Säure in Kontakt kommen sterben
CanKillWithDoubleClick: Can Kill with Double Click method
SchrodingersCatInfo: Get Attacked to Get a Role
SchrodingersCatInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs Schrödinger's Cat, if you get attacked, you turn into the same role as your killer. If you don't get attacked, you lose, or you can win with crewmates, depending on the settings.
SchrodingersCat.WinsWithCrewIfNotAttacke: Wins with crewmates if not attacked
SchrodingersCat.StealsExactImpostorRole: Steals the exact impostor role instead of <#ff1919>Renegade</color>
SchrodingersCat.Notify.KillerRecruited: You have recruited the {1}! {0} now has the same role as you.
SchrodingersCat.Notify.RecruitedByKiller: You have been recruited by the {1}! You now have the same role as {0}.
SocialiteInfo: Know Who Interacts With Your Target
SocialiteInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Socialite, you can use your kill button to mark your target every round. When someone tries to kill your target, the kill gets blocked and they get added to your Guest List (they know about this). Players' names that are in your Guest List are shown in black. Players on the Guest List can kill your target. You can also add players to your Guest List by voting them.
CherokiousInfo: Do tasks to get Bullets to Kill
CherokiousInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Cherokious, you can get bullets by completing tasks. You can kill by petting near someone. You can only kill if you have bullets.
AutocratInfo: TP nearest player to you by doing a task
AutocratInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Autocrat, when you complete a task, you teleport the nearest player to you.
NightmareInfo: You cannot be killed during lights out
NightmareInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Nightmare, you cannot be killed during the lights out sabotage.
PerceiverInfo: Check How Many Killers Are Nearby
PerceiverInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Perceiver, you can vent/pet to check how many killers are near you. The radius is specified by the host.
ConvenerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Convener, you can vent/pet to teleport everyone to you.
MathematicianInfoLong: (Besatzung):\nAls Mathematiker, kannst du '/ask [number] [number]' verwenden, um eine mathematische Frage zu stellen (Was ist [number] + [number]?). Der erste Spieler, der richtig antwortet, wird in der nächsten Runde +1-Fähigkeit benutzt und abgeschirmt. Du kannst nur einmal pro Meeting fragen.
MathematicianQuestionString: Was ist {0} + {1}? Tippe '/answer [answer]', um zu antworten. Wer als Erstes die richtige Antwort gibt, wird für die nächste Runde geschützt!
MathematicianAnsweredString: {0} hat korrekt geantwortet! ({1}) Du erhälst +1 Fähigkeitsnutzungen und wirst für die nächste Runde geschützt
EscortInfo: Role-Block Players to Help the Crew!
EscortInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Escort, you can role-block a player for a specified time using your kill button. A role-blocked player cannot kill, vent, sabotage or report.\n(Role-Block duration is the same as the hack duration for The Glitch)
GauloisInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nAs the Gaulois, you can use your kill button on someone to give them a permanent speed boost.
ConsortInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Consort, you can role-block a player which prevents them from killing, venting, sabotaging and reporting for some time by clicking your kill button on them once. Double click with your kill button on them to kill them normally.\n(The role-block duraiton is the same as the hack duration for The Glitch)
DonutDeliveryInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Donut Delivery, you can deliver donuts to players by pressing your kill button on them. The donut has absolutely no effect, other than the target knowing they got a donut.
DonutDelivered-0: \nSuccess!\nThey devoured the donut like it was the last task on the ship.
DonutDelivered-1: \nDelivered with perfection!\nTheir happiness level is higher than the emergency meeting button.
DonutDelivered-2: \nIt's official:\nthe donut delivery was more satisfying than completing all tasks!
DonutDelivered-3: \nGlowing reviews!\nThe donut got more compliments than the cafeteria emergency table.
DonutDelivered-4: \nPositive vibes only!\nThey're raving about the donut like it's the 'Best Crewmate' award.
DonutDelivered-5: \nDonut delivery rated MVP – Most Valuable Pastry!
DonutDelivered-6: \nSweet success!\nThe donut hit the spot, just like an impostor's target.
DonutDelivered-7: \nVictory dance!\nThe donut delivery was smoother than venting.
DonutDelivered-8: \nSweetness level: Maximum.\nDonut delivery achieved a sweet victory!
DonutDelivered-9: \nDelivered!\nThey loved it more than a victory screen!
DonutDelivered-10: \nSuccessful drop-off!\nThe donut was a hit, not a sus move!
DonutDelivered-11: \nDonut delivered without a crumb of suspicion!
DonutDelivered-12: \nPositive feedback!\nThey said the donut was so good it was almost 'impostor-able'!
DonutDelivered-13: \nNot a fan of the flavor?\nMaybe next time, stick to venti lattes...
DonutDelivered-14: \nUnpopular opinion:\nThey didn't like the chocolate. Maybe go for sprinkles next time?
DonutDelivered-15: \nThe donut was killer, just like their alibi.
DonutDelivered-16: \nOops! Donut delivery failed.\nThey're probably more into bagels...
DonutDelivered-17: \nRejected!\nTurns out, they're on a diet. Tough crowd!
DonutDelivered-18: \nFailed delivery alert.\nLooks like they prefer impostor snacks.
DonutGot-0:
Special delivery!
You've been 'dough'nuted' by the Donut Delivery crewmate.
Enjoy the sweetness!
DonutGot-1:
Congrats!
You just got 'holey' goodness delivered by the Donut Delivery crewmate.
Treat yourself!
DonutGot-2:
Donut Delivery here!
Your order of one delicious donut has been successfully dispatched.
Enjoy the flavor explosion!
DonutGot-3:
Surprise!
You've been visited by the Donut Delivery crewmate.
It's a killer treat!
DonutGot-4:
Ding-dong! A donut delivery is at your door.
Courtesy of the Donut Delivery crewmate.
Savor the sweetness!
DonutGot-5:
Special delivery alert!
You've just received a 'killer' donut from the Donut Delivery crewmate.
Enjoy the crime scene... I mean snack!
DonutDeliverSpeedEffect: Speed Boost For Players Who Get Donuts
RhapsodeInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Rhapsode, you can vent/pet to start singing. During this time, no one can vent or shapeshift since they're distracted by your song. (Settings may exclude Crewmates.)
ChronomancerInfo: Charge up your kill button and go ham!
ChronomancerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Chronomancer, when your kill cooldown is up, your kill button starts charging (you'll see the percentage of the charge under your name). When you make a kill, you use the charge. Depending on how much you've charged your kill button up, you'll have a 0 second kill cooldown until the charge runs out. When the charge runs out, your kill cooldown is reset.
ChargeInterval: Charge Percentage Gained Each Second When Kill Cooldown Is Up
ChargeLossInterval: Charge Percentage Lost Each Second While Killing
NullifierInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Nullifier, clicking your kill button on a player once will remove 1 ability use from them, if they have any. Double click with your kill button on someone to kill them normally.

Note: You won't know if the target had an ability use limit, but the target may notice the removal. Be careful!
VentguardInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Ventguard, you can enter vents to block them. No one can enter blocked vents, except Crewmates, if the setting is on. You will be notified if someone tries to use the vent you blocked. Blocked vents reset every meeting.
EnteredBlockedVent: <color=#ffff00>This vent is blocked by the Ventguard</color>
VentguardNotify: Someone tried to use a blocked vent
VentguardNotifyOnBlockedVentUse: Notify When Someone Tries to Use a Blocked Vent
VortexInfo: Your victims' bodies teleport to a random vent
VortexInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Vortex, when you kill someone, their body teleports to a random vent. The body will be reported in the vent.
Vortex.IfTargetCannotBeTeleported: If the target cannot be teleported to a random vent
AllergicInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Allergic, you are allergic to a random player in the game. When you go near that player, your allergy level starts increasing. If it reaches 100%, you die. You must stay away from the player you're allergic to at all times.
Allergic.Time: Time in which the allergy level goes from 0% to 100%
Allergic.Range: Maximum distance from the target that is considered nearby
EnigmaInfoLong: (Besatzung): Als Enigma erhältst du bei jedem Treffen einen zufälligen Hinweis auf den Mörder. Je nach Einstellung musst du möglicherweise die Leiche melden, um einen Hinweis zu erhalten. Je mehr Aufgaben du erfüllst, desto genauer werden die Hinweise. Helle Farben: Rot, Pink, Orange, Gelb, Weiß, Türkis, Limette, Rosé, Banane, Koralle Dunkle Farben: Blau, Grün, Schwarz, Lila, Braun, Rotbraun, Grau, Sand
EnigmaClueGetCluesWithoutReporting: <color=#676798>Enigma</color> kann <color=#676798>Hinweise</color> erhalten, ohne eine Leiche zu melden
EnigmaClueName1: Der Killer hat den Buchstaben {0} oder {1} im Namen!
EnigmaClueName2: Der Killer hat den Buchstaben {0} im Namen!
EnigmaClueName3: Der Killer hat den Buchstaben {0} und {1} im Namen!
EnigmaClueNameLength1: Der Name des Killers hat eine Länge zwischen {0} und {1} Buchstaben!
EnigmaClueNameLength2: Der Name des Killers hat eine Länge von {0} Buchstaben!
EnigmaClueColor1: Der Killer hat eine helle Farbe!
EnigmaClueColor2: Der Killer hat eine dunkle Farbe!
EnigmaClueLocation: Der letzte Raum, in dem der Killer war, ist {0}!
EnigmaClueStatus1: Der Killer sitzt gerade in einem Schacht!
EnigmaClueStatus2: Der Killer ist gerade auf einer Leiter!
EnigmaClueLevel1: Das Level des Killers ist über 50!
EnigmaClueLevel2: Das Level des Killers ist unter 50!
EnigmaClueLevel3: Das Level des Killers ist zwischen {0} und {1}!
GuesserNumRestrictions: Restrict the Number of Guessers on Each Team
GuesserSuicides: Guessers Suicide When Trying to Guess Players With <#BAAAE9>Onbound</color>
InfectionInfoLong: (Neutrals) (Plague Doctor from TOH):\nThe Plague Doctor's goal is to infect every living player. They start by choosing one player to infect, after which anyone who spends a set amount of time in range of the infected player becomes infected themselves. Infection progress is cumulative, and does not reset with distance or after meetings.
LovingCrewmateInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Lover, your goal is to stay alive until the end of the game and help your lover win. If your lover dies, you will die as well.
LovingImpostorInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Loving Impostor, your goal is to stay alive until the end of the game and help your lover win. If your lover dies, you will die as well. However, you're also an impostor! You can win either way, but you must keep your lover alive.
EndermanInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Enderman, you can sabotage/pet to mark the position where you're currently standing. You'll teleport back to that position after a specified amount of time.
MycologistInfo: Spread Spores and Kill Infected Players
MycologistInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Mycologist, you can infect players around you by entering a vent/sabotaging/petting. You can only kill the ones you've infected.
BubbleInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAls Blase kannst du einen Spieler mit deinem Kill Knopf umhüllen. Sie explodieren in einer bestimmten Zeit und töten alle in der Nähe. Abhängig von den Einstellungen können andere Spieler den umhüllten Spieler nach einer bestimmten Zeit sehen
HookshotInfo: Pull Players or TP to them
HookshotInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Hookshot, you may mark a target by clicking on your target once. Double click to kill them normally. Vent to switch between the 2 teleporting modes: Teleport Target to You / You Teleport to Target. Sabotage/Pet to execute the current selected action mode after marking a target.
SprayerInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Sprayer, you can place traps by sabotaging/petting. If someone walks into a trap, they'll have lower speed and vision for some time. If a player walks into a trap a specified amount of times, they suicide.
SprayerMaxTrappedTimes: Times a Player Has to Walk Into a Trap to Die
ElectricInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Electric, when you complete a task, a random killer gets frozen for a few seconds.
MoleInfo: TP to Random Vents by Entering One
MoleInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Mole, when you vent, you get kicked out and teleport to a random vent on the map. / Pet to teleport to a random vent.
TornadoInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Tornado, you can spawn tornados by petting. When someone walks close to a tornado, they fly (teleport) to a random place on the ship.
TeleportedByTornado: \nOh no! You just got caught up in a tornado,\nand you flew to over here!
DeadlinedInfo: Must do a task or use kill button each round
DeadlinedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Deadlined, you must complete a task or use your kill button (not necessarily for directly killing) on someone each round. If you fail to do so, you will die. If a meeting gets called too soon after the previous one ends (time set by the host), you won't die. This doesn't apply on the first round.
Deadlined.MustDoTask: <size=80%><#ffa500>You must complete a task or kill before the next meeting</color></size>
AssumerInfoLong: (Impostors): As the Assumer, you can type /assume {id} {number} to assume that the selected player (whose ID you typed as the first argument, replacing '{id}') will get exactly {number} votes (the number you typed in the second argument, replacing '{number}'). Example: /assume 0 3 (assume that the host gets 3 votes). If you are correct, every player that voted for your target dies.
Assumer.AssumedMessage: You're assuming that {0} will receive {1} votes
Assumer.VoteReceiverDies: Vote Receiver Dies on Correct Assumption
Assumer.MinPlayersToAssume: Minimum Alive Players to Make Assumptions
SentinelInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Sentinel, you may vent to start patrolling your surrounding area. When you do, all killers within this area are notified to dip. If any killer attempts to kill someone within this area while you're patrolling, you'll kill them instead. When patrolling is over, all killers in the patrolling area suicide. While patrolling, you have lower vision.
KillerNotifyPatrol: <#ffff00>You are in the patrolling radius!\nYou have <#ffa500>{0}s</color> to move out or you'll die!</color>
PenguinInfoLong: (Impostors):\nPenguins can restrain target by pressing the kill button, and drag around. While dragging, the target dies by pressing the kill button again or after a certain period of time. Press the kill button twice for a direct kill.
PenguinMeetingKill: Kill the target if a meeting starts during dragging.
PenguinVictimCanUseAbilities: Victim Can Use Their Abilities While Being Dragged
StealthInfo: Killing Blinds Everyone in the Room
StealthInfoLong: (Impostors):\nWhen the Stealth kills, players in the same room are blinded for a short time.
AnalystInfo: Analysiere Spieler, um Informationen zu erhalten
AnalystInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Als Analyst kannst du den Kill-Knopf auf jemanden anwenden, um ihn zu analysieren. Du musst einige Sekunden lang neben dem Ziel stehen bleiben, um die Analyse abzuschließen. Nach Abschluss der Analyse siehst du, wie viele Spieler diese Person bisher getötet hat, wie oft sie bisher die Schächte genutzt hat und auf was ihre Rolle basiert. 

Hinweis: Wenn die Einstellungen des Hosts es nicht zulassen, dass Sie bestimmte Informationen sehen, wird das Ergebnis 0 oder nichts angezeigt! 
Hinweis: Keiner dieser Faktoren bestimmt, ob jemand böse ist oder nicht! Überlege zweimal, bevor du zu schnell urteilst!
AnalyzerResult: Analyseergebnis für <color=#00ffa5>{0}</color>anzeigen:\nKills: <color=#ff1919>{1}</color>, Schächte: <color=#ffa500>{2}</color>, Basis der Rolle: <color=#00ffff>{3}</color>
DrainerInfo: Entleere Schächte, wenn du sie Betrittst
DrainerInfoLong: (Besatzung):\nAls Drainer kannst du Schächte nutzen, um sie zu entleeren und alle Spieler zu töten, die sich in diesem und allen verbundenen Schächten befinden.
CameraManInfoLong: (Besatzung): Als Kameramann kannst du die Schächte nutzen oder dein Haustier streicheln, um dich direkt in den Raum zu teleportieren, in dem sich die Kameras befinden
TPBackWhenMoveAway: Zurückteleportieren, wenn man sich von den Kameras entfernt
EchoInfo: Make Players Die Where You Want
EchoInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Echo, you can shapeshift into a player to swap locations and skins with them. During the shapeshift, your target cannot move. When you unshift, the swap reverts and the target dies exactly where you were.

You cannot kill normally.
HackerInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
This role allows you to see the admin map from anywhere, but is different for modded clients and vanilla clients.

As a modded client, whenever you open the map (and have ability uses left), the admin map will show up. You may be able to move while having the map open depending on settings.

As a vanilla client, you may enter a vent/pet to get a notification saying how many people are in different rooms on the ship (essentially admin map).
HackerModdedClientAbilityUseSecondsMulti: Modded clients, for 1 ability use, can view Admin map for
HackerModdedClientCanMoveWhileViewingMap: Modded clients can move while looking at Admin map
HackerVanillaClientSeesInfoFor: Vanilla clients see admin info notify for
VengeanceInfo: Töte deinen Mörder, um zu leben
VengeanceInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Vengeance, you win when you're the last one standing. Additionally, when someone tries to kill you, the kill will be blocked and you will be teleported to a random vent. You will have a limited time to kill your killer. If you succeed to do so, you live. If the time runs out before you kill your killer, you die permanently. If you try to kill someone else other than your killer, you will die.
VengeanceRevenge: You have {0}s to kill your killer
HeadHunterInfo: Kill your target for low cooldown
HeadHunterInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Head Hunter, you have 3 targets that reset every meeting. If you kill one of your targets, your kill cooldown decreases by the set amount permanently. If you kill someone else other than any of your targets, your kill cooldown permanently increases by the set amount. You see your targets with a black name.
HHSuccessKCDDecrease: Kill-Abklingzeit beim Töten eines Ziels verringern
HHFailureKCDIncrease: Kill Cooldown Increase on killing others
StasisInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Stasis, you can vanish/pet/vanish to 'freeze time'. That means, all players will be frozen and blind, and no one will be able to do anything. Depending on the settings, the blinding and freezing may exclude other impostor-teamed players.
AmogusInfoLong: (Neutrals): As the Amogus, you can thank Rabek for the role idea. Lol. Anyway, Amogus is a neutral killer that can use shift/vanish/pet button to switch between regular and amogus form. You can vent and you have impostor vision. You can only kill in amogus form. You can stay in amogus form for a limited amount of time. After killing someone, your amogus form upgrades. These are the levels: Amogus -> Sugoma -> Sumogus -> Suspicious Sus -> Ultimate Sus When you're in amogus form, you're anonymous and look different depending on your level. Levels also give extra abilities that work only in amogus form. Amogus: Starting level, regular white amogus without extra special abilities. Sugoma: Upside down amogus. Is faster, but your controls are inverted. Sumogus: Wide amogus with two visors. No one can interact with you and you have sugoma ability, but your controls aren't inverted anymore. Suspicious Sus: Amogus that is robot. You have all abilities of Sumogus and in addition you can see an arrow to every player. Ultimate Sus: Red amogus. Has all abilities of lower levels. Your kill cooldown is reduced by 50%. If you kill someone, you get additional vote(s).
Amogus.SuspiciousSusArrowsToBodies: At Suspicious Sus level, when someone dies, the arrow points at the dead body instead of disappearing
Amogus.UltimateSusVotesPerKill: Number of Extra Votes gained for every kill, when the level is Ultimate Sus
RabbitInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Rabbit, each time you complete a task, you see an arrow pointing towards a random impostor for 5 seconds.\nNote: This ability may only activate after you've completed a set number of tasks.
RabbitMinTasks: Minimum Number of Tasks Completed to Activate Ability
PyromaniacInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Pyromaniac, your job is to kill everyone and be the last one standing. Your special ability is that you can douse players. Whenever you kill a doused player, your kill cooldown will be very short.
PyroBurnCooldown: Kill Cooldown after killing a Doused Player
WeaponMasterInfo: Use your weapons to kill everyone
WeaponMasterInfoLong:
(Neutral):
As the Weapon Master, you can cycle between your weapons by petting/calling a sabotage.

The Sword weapon is a normal kill method.

The Axe weapon kills everyone in a certain radius when you make a kill. You have a higher kill cooldown while using this weapon.

The Lance weapon sets your kill range to the maximum, and you don't lunge toward your kills. You can't vent while using this weapon.

While using your Shield, you can survive an attack once. You can't kill while using your shield.
OverrideOtherCrewBasedRoles: Override Other Crew Based Roles to Engineer (not just regular Crewmate)
SpawnAdditionalRenegadeOnImpsDead: Random <#8cffff>Crewmate</color> Turns To <#ff1919>Renegade</color> When All <#ff1919>Impostors</color> Die
SpawnAdditionalRenegadeWhenNKAlive: Spawn Even If a <#ffab1b>Neutral Killer</color> is Alive
SpawnAdditionalRenegadeMinAlivePlayers: Minimum Number of Alive Players to Spawn
PetsForceEnabled: The Speedrun game mode requires pets to be enabled, so they are forced on. You can disable it for future games under Game Modifiers.
CustomTeamHelp: You are in the {0}! ({1})\nWork with your team members to win together!
NoPetActionMsg3: You start wondering whether you are sus or not
NoPetActionMsg5: You contemplate the meaning of life for a moment.
NoPetActionMsg6: You try to teach your pet the art of stealth.
NoPetActionMsg7: You attempt to have a deep conversation with your pet about the mysteries of the spaceship.
NoPetActionMsg8: You rehearse your emergency meeting speech in your head.
NoPetActionMsg9: You realize you left the space oven on in the cafeteria.
NoPetActionMsg10: You practice your emergency venting technique, just in case.
NoPetActionMsg11: You perform a quick dance move to entertain your pet.
NoPetActionMsg12: You start a one-person conga line around the reactor.
NoPetActionMsg13: You mime fixing a non-existent spaceship engine.
NoPetActionMsgImp1: You are an Impostor, but you probably know that
NoPetActionMsgImp2: You debate whether space pizza or space burgers would make a better crewmate meal.
NoPetActionMsgCrewWithTasksLeft: You realize you still have tasks to do
NoPetActionMsgCrew: You imagine yourself as the impostor in a parallel universe.
NoPetActionMsgNeutral1: You imagine yourself as the impostor in a parallel universe.
NoPetActionMsgNeutral2: You question yourself how did you get here
UniqueNeutralRevealScreen: Each <#ffab1b>Neutral</color> Role Has Its Own Reveal Screen
EclipseInfo: Your vision increases with each kill you get
EclipseInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Eclipse, your job is to kill everyone and be the last one standing to win. You start with a low vision, and with each kill you get, it slowly increases.
EclipseVisionIncrease: Increase Vision per each kill by
MastermindInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Mastermind, you can use your kill button on a player once to manipulate them. They'll be told after a delay that they were manipulated and they must kill someone within a limited time to survive. If the time limit expires or a meeting gets called before killing someone, they die.\nDouble click on someone to kill them normally.
ManipulateNotify: \n<color=#ff1919>You were manipulated by the Mastermind!</color>\n<color=#ffff00>You must kill someone within <color=#ffa500>{0}s</color> or you die!</color>
ManipulatedKilled: The player you manipulated has killed
GamblerInfo: Mit jedem Kill erhältst du einen Effekt
GamblerInfoLong: (Verräter):\nNach jedem Kill passiert dem Glücksspieler ein zufälliges Ereignis. Diese dadurch erhaltenen Effekte können irgendwo zwischen einer Selbstmeldung und einem zusätzlichen Scharfschützen-Schuss liegen
GamblerWhatToIgnore: Was zu ignorieren ist, wenn der Effekt „Unaufhaltsam“ angewendet wird
GamblerIgnoreCursedWolfAndJinx: Töte <color=#ff1919> den verfluchten Wolf</color> und <color=#ed2f91>verhexe dich</color>
PatrollerInfo: Have Different Boosts in Each Room
PatrollerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Patroller, you have different boosts in each room. At the start of the game, it gets randomly rolled which boosts you get in which room. Additionally, you can vent freely from any room once per round.

Kill everyone to win!
You can see your boosts by petting if the setting to use them is on.
PatrollerNotifyNoBoost: You are now in <color=#00ffa5>{0}</color>\nIn this room, you have <#ff0000>no boosts</color>
PatrollerNotify: You are now in <color=#00ffa5>{0}</color>\nIn this room, {1}
IntrovertInfo: You Don't Like Being Near Players
IntrovertInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Introvert, if you stay near other players for too long, you teleport away to a random vent.
Introvert.Radius: Radius in which players are considered nearby
Introvert.Time: Time to be near players before teleporting
HitmanInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Hitman, you may shapeshift into someone to mark them as your target. If you kill your target, your next kill cooldown will be lower.

Note: Once you chose a target, you cannot change it. You'll get a chance to mark a target again after killing your current target.
SapperInfo: Blow up Everyone with Timed Bombs!
SapperInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Sapper, you can not kill with your kill button. Instead, you can pet/vanish to plant time bombs which explode after a specified delay (set by host), killing everyone nearby.

Note: If you're in the radius of the explosion, you will die too!
ImitatorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Imitator, you can imitate the role of a dead player using the /imitate {id} command. Replace '{id}' with the ID of the player whose role you want to imitate.\nAlternatively, if you aren't the host, use the kick menu to select a player to imitate.
Imitator.Success: <#00ff00>✓ <#00bb00>You will be imitating {0} in the next round!
FabricatorInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Fabricator, you can use /fabricate {deathreason} to set the death reason for your next kill. Replace '{deathreason}' with one of the available death reasons in the mod.
Fabricator.SetDeathReason: <#00ff00>✓ <#00bb00>Your next kill will have the death reason: <#ffffff>{0}</color>
ComposterInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs a Composter, you gain more ability uses by a set multiplier per task, kill, or after finishing tasks.
SlendermanInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Slenderman, whenever someone gets close to you, they will be blinded until they move away from you.

Kill everyone to win!
CarrierInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Carrier, mark a location by petting. Then you can use your shapeshift menu to teleport someone to that location.
Carrier.TargetNotify: You were carried to a new location!
PortalMakerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Portal Maker, you can place 2 permanent portals by petting. After placing both portals, if anyone goes near one of them, they will be teleported to the other portal. Portal usage has a 5 second cooldown.
RiftMakerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Rift Maker, you may shapeshift twice/pet twice to mark two points on the ship. After you've marked both places, whenever you go near a marked place, you will automatically teleport to the other mark point.
Venting discards both marked places.

You cannot vent normally.
IncorrectMarks: \n<color=#ffff00>Your 2 marks are too close to each other, they won't work</color>\nYour marks were discarded.
MagicianInfo: Spiele deine Karten um zu gewinnen
MagicianInfoLong:
(Neutral):
As the Magician, you get a card after each kill you make. Whenever you get a card, a message will appear with its description and effect.

To play a card, call any sabotage (not doors) (the sabotage won't actually be called), or use the Pet button if the setting is on.
MagicianLowKCD: Kill Cooldown when using Overlocking Device
Magician-GetIdToDesc-1: Slows down everyone nearby for some time.
Magician-GetIdToDesc-3: Teleports you to a random vent.
Magician-GetIdToDesc-4: Use twice to mark 2 positions. Going near a marked position teleports you to the other.
Magician-GetIdToDesc-6: Blinds everyone nearby for some time.
Magician-GetIdToDesc-7: Place a time bomb. When it explodes, it kills everyone nearby.
Magician-GetIdToDesc-8: Increases your speed for some time.
Magician-GetIdToDesc-10: See how many players are in each room.
NecromancerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nThe Necromancer is the main recruiter for the Undead faction. The first person it kills will become a Deathknight. With the help of the Deathknight, they must work together to convert others to the Undead. If the Necromancer were to die, The Deathknight would turn into Necromancer.
DeathknightInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nThe Deathknight must help the Necromancer convert players to the Undead. By using your pet button by someone who the Necromancer had used their kill button on, they will be converted. There can only be one Deathknight at a time, and if the Necromancer dies, the Deathknight will be the new Necromancer.
RecruitedByDeathknight: You've been recruited to the Undead faction!
DeathknightRecruitedPlayer: Successfully recruited player to the Undead faction!
RecruitedToDeathknight: The Necromancer recruited you to be their Deathknight!
ImpartialInfo: Kill Specified Number of Players in Each Team
ImpartialInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Impartial, you must kill a specified number of players from each team to win. You can see how many players you need to kill from each team next to your role name.
ImpartialCanWinWhenKillingMore: Can Win Even When Killing More of a Team than the Maximum
SoulHunterInfoLong: (Neutralen):\nAls Seelenjäger, kannst du dein Ziel über den Knopf "töten" markieren. In der nächsten Sitzung werden Sie für eine bestimmte Anzahl von Sekunden eingefroren und Ihr Ziel wird darüber informiert, dass es Ihr Ziel ist. Dein Ziel wird nicht in der Lage sein, dich zu verschmelzen, anzurufen oder dich zu töten. Du musst dein Ziel innerhalb einer bestimmten Anzahl von Sekunden töten, sonst verlierst du eine Seele. Wenn du dein Ziel rechtzeitig tötest, erhältst du eine Seele. Sammle eine Menge an Seelen, um deine Gewinn-Bedingung zu erfüllen. Wenn Ihr Siegerzustand am Ende des Spiels erfüllt ist, gewinnen Sie mit dem Siegerteam.
SoulHunterNumOfSoulsToWin: Number of Souls Required to Win
SoulHunterGetSoulForSuicide: Gain Soul When Target Dies By Other Means
SoulHunterTargetNotify: The <color=#3f2c61>Soul Hunter</color>, <color=#00ffa5>{0}</color> is hunting you. Hide!
SoulHunterTargetNotifyNoMeeting: <color=#ffff00>You cannot call emergency meetings while being hunted</color>
SoulHunterTargetNotifyNoKill: <color=#ffff00>You cannot kill the <color=#3f2c61>Soul Hunter</color> while being hunted</color>
BeaconInfo: Increase Nearby Players' Vision During Lights
BeaconInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Beacon, during the lights sabotage, you increase the vision of players around you.
LibrarianInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Librarian, when you're in silencing mode, if someone reports a body next to you, you'll kill them instead. After you kill someone like this, everyone will see 'SSSH!' in red under your name.
UsesPetInsteadOfKillNotice: <#ffff00>⚠ As this role, you need to use your pet button as your kill button!</color>
UsesMeetingShapeshiftNotice: <#ffff00>⚠ As this role, instead of commands and votes, you need to use the shapeshift menu in meetings to select your target!</color>
UseMeetingShapeshift: Use Shapeshift Menu in Meetings to Select Targets Instead of Commands/Votes
UseMeetingShapeshiftForGuessing: Even For Guessing (may disconnect the host on vanilla servers)
FramerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Framer, single click with your kill button on someone to frame them, making the game think they're on the impostor team. Double click to kill normally.
Framer.TargetFramedNotify: The game now thinks {0} is an <#ff1919>impostor</color>
BackstabberInfo: Stab a Team in the Back
BackstabberInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAls Doppelagent kannst du optional 1 Spieler töten. Wenn du niemanden tötest, gewinnst du mit den Crewmates. Wenn du einen Impostor oder einen Madmate tötest, gewinnst du mit dem gewinnenden Neutralen Killer. Wenn du einen anderen als einen Impostor oder einen Madmate tötest, gewinnst du mit den Betäubungsmitteln.
Backstabber.MurderNotify: Your kill target was {0}\nThis means, you'll win with {1}
GuessBackstabber: You cannot guess a revealed Backstabber.
EnableAutoMessage: Enable Auto-Message (sends the template with the 'Notification' tag on a given interval in lobby)
WiperInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Wiper, you can wipe out a room by using pet/vanish. This will kill everyone in that room. (Even other impostors, depending on the settings.)
You cannot kill normally.
You cannot use your ability during sabotages.
Wiper.KillOtherImpostors: Wiping Out a Room Kills Other <#ff1919>Impostors</color>
Wiper.CannotUseAbilityDuringSabotage: You cannot use your ability during sabotages
Wiper.MustBeInRoomToUseAbility: You must be in a generic room to use your ability
CurserInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Curser, when you use your kill button on someone, you can single click on them to reveal their alignment, and double click to give them one of the following effects:<size=80%>
- -1 ability use
- +1 harmful add-on
- permanent low vision
- permanent low speed</size>
You win if crewmates lose.
Curser.Notify.0: You've removed an ability use from your target
Curser.Notify.1: You gave your target a harmful add-on
Curser.Notify.2: You gave your target permanent low vision
Curser.Notify.3: You gave your target permanent low speed
WeathermanInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Weatherman, you can spawn a random natural disaster by using your pet/vanish button. The disasters are the same as in the Natural Disasters game mode.

Use these disasters to kill everyone to win!
PostmanInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Postman, your job is to deliver mail to everyone. You'll always have a target, and you need to click your kill button on that target to deliver the mail to them. When you've delivered mail to everyone, your win condition is satisfied. You'll win with the winning team, no matter what happens.
PostmanDiesWhenTargetDies: <color=#00b893>Postman</color> dies when the current target dies
PostmanHasArrowsToTargets: <color=#00b893>Postman</color> has an arrow pointing towards their current target
PostmanDone: <color=#00ff00>You're done delivering messages!\nYou'll win with the winning team at the end.</color>
NecroGuesserInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Necro-Guesser, your job is to guess the roles of dead players. Use /bt {id} {role} to guess. {id} is the player's ID, view them by using /id, {role} is the player's role. You need to guess a certain amount of dead players' roles to win with the winning team at the end.
NecroGuesser.NumGuessesToWin: Number of Guesses Required to Win
RecklessInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Reckless, your cooldown decreases with each kill you get. However, this isn't permanent. Your kill cooldown resets back to its default value at every meeting.
IgnitorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Ignitor, you can light a new candle by completing a task, which sets your vision to maximum. As time goes on and the candle burns down, your vision progressively gets smaller. Since you use candles, you're immune to the Lights Sabotage.
AltruistInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Altruist, you can revive a dead player by reporting their body. The revived player will be able to continue playing as if they were never dead. If you revive a player, you will die.\nYou can switch between reviving and reporting modes by entering a vent/petting.
AltruistKillerAlert: <#ffff00><size=150%>A player you killed was revived by the <color=#300000>Altruist</color>!</size></color>
Altruist.ReviveTargetCanReportTheirOwnBo: Revived players can report their own dead body
Altruist.ReviveTargetsKillerGetsAlert: The killer of the revived player gets an alert about the revival
Altruist.ReviveTargetsKillerGetsArrow: The killer also gets an arrow towards the revived player
AdventurerInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the Adventurer, you can collect resources listed below and craft them into weapons if you have the required amount of materials for it. Resources (and how to obtain them): - ❖ (Complete a Task) - Θ (Players Leave This Behind*) - ♳ (Dead Bodies*) - ⁂ (Shapeshift Skins*) - ☀ (Fix Lights) - ○ (Found in Groups*) * When this resource is available somewhere, you get an arrow pointing towards that location. (Except dead bodies.) Go there to collect it. Weapons (and their ingredients): - Gun (1 ♳ + 1 ❖) (Kill nearest player) - Shield (3 ❖) (Gives nearest player a 1-time shield) - Lantern (1 ☀ + 1 ❖) (Increases crewmates' vision for some time) - Portal (2 Θ) (Swaps you with a random player) - Wrench (1 ☀ + 2 ❖) (Clears the current sabotage) - Proxy (2 ○ + 1 ❖) (Gives you +1 vote in the next meeting) - Prediction (1 ♳ + 2 ⁂ + 1 ❖) (Reveals the nearest player's role) - RNG (2 Θ + 2 ❖) (Makes a random weapon) To use your weapons, pet.
AdventurerWeaponDescription.Gun: Kill the next player you go near
AdventurerWeaponDescription.Lantern: Increases crewmates' vision for some time
AdventurerWeaponDescription.Portal: Swaps you with a random player
AdventurerWeaponDescription.Proxy: Gives you +1 vote in the next meeting
AdventurerIngredientsDisplay: {0}: {1}\nVent to craft this weapon / Pet to cycle to next weapon
ChefInfoLong: (Besatzung):\nAls Koch kannst du Mahlzeiten für alle zubereiten, indem du Aufgaben erfüllst. Wenn ein Besatzungsmitglied eine Mahlzeit erhält, bekommt es einen zufälligen Boost (Geschwindigkeit, Sicht, Schild). Wenn ein Verräter oder ein neutraler Killer eine Mahlzeit erhält, ist diese verdorben und muss innerhalb einer bestimmten Zeit ausgespuckt werden, sonst wird er für einige Zeit geblendet und eingefroren.
ChefNotify: Der <#d6d6ff>Koch</color> hat dir {0}gekocht!\nDies hat dir den Effekt <#ffff00>{1} gegeben</color>
NoteKillerInfo: Find Players' Real Names to Kill Them in Meetings
NoteKillerInfoLong: (Neutrals): As the Note Killer, you can pet/vanish to see a part of everyone's real names for a few seconds. This has a cooldown. If you find someone's full real name, you can use /dn {realname}, replacing {realname} with the name you've found. If that name is correct, the game will instantly kill the player whose real name you've entered. Everyone knows you're in the game and everyone sees their own real name.
NoteKiller.MinLettersRevealed: Minimum Number of Letters Revealed From Each Name
NoteKiller.MaxLettersRevealed: Maximum Number of Letters Revealed From Each Name
NoteKiller.OthersSelfSuffix: <size=70%>There's a {0} in the game. Your real name is <#00ffa5>{1}</color></size>
DeathNoteCommand.CanNotGuess: You've already tried to guess someone's real name and failed, so you can't guess again until the next meeting.
DeathNoteCommand.PlayerNotFoundOrDead: The player with this name was not found or is already dead.
DeathNoteCommand.SuccessForOthers: {0} was killed by the Note Killer.
PulseInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Pulse, your kill cooldown is different after every even numbered kill and every odd numbered kill of yours. You have a separate cooldown after meetings. Your first kill after every meeting will set your cooldown to the Even-Numbered Kill Cooldown, your second kill will set it to the Odd-Numbered Kill Cooldown, and the process repeats until a meeting is called again.
ExpressInfo: Du erhältst einen Geschwindigkeits-Boost beim Abschluss einer Aufgabe
ExpressInfoLong: (besatzung):\nAls Express erhälst du einen kleinen Geschwindigkeitsschub, nachdem du eine Aufgabe erledigt hast
SwapperInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the Swapper, you can use the command /sw [ID] twice to choose 2 players. Those votes received by those 2 players will be swapped. You can see everyone's IDs next to their name. For example, if 3 players voted red, and 5 players voted yellow, and you swap red and yellows' IDs, then red will receive 5 votes, and yellow will receive 3 votes. Due to technical difficulties, the Host's original vote will seem unchanged, but it's only visual, their vote will still get swapped.
CantSwapSelf: Du kannst dich nicht selbst tauschen
SwapDead: Du kannst keine Stimmen nach deinem Tod tauschen.
SwapVote: Die Stimmen bei {0} und {1} wurden getauscht!
SwapHelp: Benutze /sw [ID] um einen Spieler auszuwählen, mit dem Stimmen ausgetauscht werden sollen.
SwapNull: Kein lebendiger Spieler mit dieser ID
SecurityGuardInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Security Guard, you can vent/pet to activate your ability, which prevents everyone from calling any sabotages and closing doors while your ability is active. This affects the doors sabotage and neutrals as well.
ShyInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Shy, you can't hear whispers. You can still send them, but you won't be able to hear them.
ChangelingInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Changeling, you can vent/pet to cycle between the available impostor roles. You can see the currently selected role below your name. Select the role you want to play as, then shapeshift to confirm your choice. Your role will be changed to the role you selected.
CanPickPartnerRole: Can Pick Roles that Already Exist in the Game
CanKillBeforeRoleChange: Can Kill Before Picking a Role
AvailableRoles: Available Impostor-Teamed Role List to Choose From
RicochetInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Ricochet, you may vote someone in a meeting to make them your target. In the next round, your target will not be able to kill you.
SpyInfo: You know who interacts with you
SpyInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Spy, when someone uses their kill button on you (any ability that is used through the kill button), you'll see their name in orange for a few seconds.

Note: If a Crewmate used their ability on you, you'll also see them with an orange name!
Note: If you have no ability uses left, you won't see orange names at all!
SilencerInfo: Verwandle dich, um andere Spieler zum Schweigen zu bringen
SilencerInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als Verstummer erpresst du einen Spieler, indem du dich in diesen Verwandelst. Der erpresste Spieler darf nicht sprechen. 

Wenn der erpresste Spieler spricht, wird der Befehl „Verwirrung“ ausgelöst. Bitte sprich nicht, wenn der erpresste Spieler sein Symbol sieht.
SilencerShutUp: Sei leise! Du wirst sterben, wenn du weiter redest
SilencerMax: Maximale Anzahl, die die erpressten Spieler Sprechen dürfen
MaxPlayersAliveForSilencedToVote: Max Players Alive for Silenced Players to be able to Vote
DoppelgangerInfo: Steal The Identify of Your Target
DoppelgangerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Doppelganger, use your kill button to steal a player's identity (their name and skin) and then kill your target.

Kill everyone to win.

Note:- You can not steal the identity of the target when Camouflage is active.
TetherInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Tether, you may vote someone in a meeting to make them your target. In the next round, you can vent/pet to teleport to them anytime.\nYour targets reset every meeting.
AidInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Aid, you may use your kill button on someone to protect them from direct attacks temporarily. Mark your target via your kill button, then vent when you want to activate the shield. Neither you nor your target will know if someone tried to kill your target.
AidTargetKnowsAboutShield: Ziele wissen, dass sie geschützt sind
MinTasksToActivateAbility: Mindestanzahl der erledigten Aufgaben, um die Fähigkeit zu aktivieren
MeetingManagerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Meeting Manager, you know the roles of guessed players, and if someone misguesses, you'll see that.
MeetingManagerMessageAboutSwap: The {0} decided to swap the votes of {1} and {2}.
BenefactorInfo: Mark Tasks as a Source of a Shield
BenefactorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Benefactor, you may complete a task to mark it. When someone completes a marked task, they will gain a temporary shield.
BenefactorTargetGotShieldNotify: You got a temporary shield as the task\nyou completed was marked by the Benefactor!
TaskMarkPerRound: Maximum Number of Tasks Marked Each Round
ShifterInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Shifter, you must steal someone's role by using your kill button near them. Depending on the settings, you may also steal their progress in their role and ability uses.\nIf you have this role when the game ends, you lose!
TremorInfo: When Doom Happens, Everyone is Doomed
TremorInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Tremor, you see a timer below your name indicating when doom happens. When you kill, the timer decreases. If doom happens, you kill everyone that comes near you, and you have a specified amount of time to kill everyone, otherwise you suicide.
Tremor.TimerDecrease: Beim Töten verringert sich der Timer um
Tremor.DoomTime: Doom Time (= Time to Kill Everyone)
Tremor.DoomNotify: Doom started! The Tremor now kills everyone that comes near them!
RogueInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Rogue, you get an objective with a reward each round. You can optionally complete the objective to get the reward.
Rogue.Reward.DisableDevices: Deaktiviere alle Geräte für den Rest des Spiels
Rogue.Reward.Morph: Ability to turn into a random crewmate (by sab/pet) for 15s
Rogue.Reward.IncreasedSpeed: Geschwindigkeit für den Rest des Spiels um 0.5x erhöht
Rogue.Reward.Sabotage: Ability to sabotage for the rest of the game
Rogue.Reward.Shield: Invincibility for the rest of the game
Rogue.Reward.LongReach: Longest kill range for the rest of the game
Rogue.Reward.ImpostorVision: Impostor vision for the rest of the game
Rogue.RewardEnabled.DecreasedKillCooldow: Belohnung für verringerte Abklingzeit bei Tötungen aktivieren
JournalistInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the Journalist, you can write down notes. When you die, all players will see your notes in the next meeting. Command: /note {add/remove/clear/view} [value] - add: Add a note specified in [value] - remove: Remove a note. Provide the index of it in [value] or leave [value] blank to remove the last note. You can see the indexes of your notes by using /note view - clear: Clear all notes (leave [value] blank) - view: View all notes and their indexes (leave [value] blank) Example uses: /note add I think blue and yellow are Lovers /note remove 2 /note clear /note view
JournalistError.ArgumentOutOfRange: The index you provided is out of range. Use /note view to see the indexes of your notes.
BananaManInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Banana Man, you are a banana.
GrapplerInfo: Prevent kills and pull players towards you
GrapplerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Grappler, you can prevent 1 kill in each round if you have an ability use left at the end of the last round. The first kill attempt will be blocked and the target will be teleported to you and not die. Your ability doesn't work during sabotages.
GameModeTutorial.SoloPVP:
<size=90%>The current game mode is <#f55252>Solo PVP</color>.</size>
<size=80%>Use your kill button to damage others. If someone's HP goes below 0,
they get teleported outside the map for some time, then respawn.
When you kill someone, you get a small buff and 1 point.
The person with the most points at the end of the time limit wins!</size>
GameModeTutorial.FFA: <size=90%>The current game mode is <#00ffff>Free For All (FFA)</color>.</size>\n<size=80%>Everyone can kill. Be the last one alive to win!\nWhen you kill someone, you get a random buff or debuff.</size>
GameModeTutorial.HotPotato:
<size=90%>The current game mode is <#e8cd46>Hot Potato</color>.</size>
<size=80%>The person with a black name holds the hot potato.
They can pass it to someone by going near them.
The previous holder's name is colored in cyan, they cannot regain
the hot potato until someone else got it, unless only 2 players remain.
When the time limit ends, the holder of the hot potato dies, and the timer resets,
the hot potato is assigned to a random player. Be the last player alive to win!</size>
GameModeTutorial.HideAndSeek:
<size=90%>The current game mode is <#345eeb>Hide And Seek (Modded)</color>.</size>
<size=80%>Seekers must kill all hiders to win,
hiders must complete tasks to lower the timer.
If the time limit ends, hiders win.</size>
GameModeTutorial.Speedrun: <size=90%>The current game mode is <#800080>Speedrun</color>.</size>\n<size=80%>Complete all tasks to gain the kill button, then kill everyone to win.\nYou must do a task or kill within your time limit, else you suicide.</size>
GameModeTutorial.CaptureTheFlag:
<size=90%>The current game mode is <#1313c2>Capture The Flag</color>.</size>
<size=80%>Get to the base of the enemy team and press Vanish to pick up their flag.
Bring it back to your own base for your team to win.
Press Kill on someone to tag them, this will get rid of that player temporarily or permanently.</size>
GameModeTutorial.NaturalDisasters:
<size=90%>The current game mode is <#03fc4a>Natural Disasters</color>.</size>
<size=80%>Various disasters will constantly spawn on the map.
Some kill you instantly, some just debuff you temporarily.
Be the last player alive to win!</size>
GameModeTutorial.Snowdown:
<size=90%>The current game mode is <#e4fdff>Snowdown</color>.</size>
<size=80%>Vanish to throw a snowball in your movement direction.
If it hits someone, you get a coin. Pet to turn 20 coins into 1 point.
Call a critical sabotage to enter/exit the shop. Highest points wins!</size>
ModeDescribe.SoloPVP: In the Solo PVP game mode, everyone has HP and can use their kill button to cause damage on other players. When a player's health reaches 0, they 'die' and respawn after a few seconds. The player(s) with the highest number of kills win(s) at the end of the game.
ModeDescribe.FFA: In the FFA (Free For All) gamemode, everyone is a killer and everyone can kill anyone. The last player alive wins!\n\nSome random events make this even more fun in the mean time!
FFA_DisableVentingWhenTwoPlayersAlive: Verhindere das Nutzen der Schächte, wenn nur 3 Spieler am leben sind
FFA_EnableRandomTwists: Enable Random Swaps from time to time
FFA-Event-GetLowKCD: You got a lower kill cooldown!
FFA-Event-GetHighKCD: You got a higher kill cooldown
FFA-Event-GetTP: You got teleported to a random vent!
FFA-NoVentingBecauseTwoPlayers: There are only 2 players alive, stop hiding in vents!
FFA-NoVentingBecauseKCDIsUP: Your kill cooldown is up, don't hide in vents!
FFA_DisableVentingWhenKCDIsUp: Verhindere das Nutzen der Schächte, wenn der Spieler eine Kill-Wartezeit hat
FFA_TargetIsShielded: <color=#ffff00>The player you tried to kill is shielded!</color>
FFA_ShieldBroken: <color=#ffff00>Someone tried to kill you, your shield is now broken!</color>
ModeDescribe.StopAndGo: In Stop And Go, everyone has 3 timers with symbols for movement directions: ← (left) 17s, → (right) 5s, ⇅ (up/down) 9s. Each symbol is red or green. When a timer reaches 0, its color swaps.\nConcept: You can't move in directions with a red symbol, or you die. Everyone is a crewmate. First to finish all tasks wins!
StopAndGo_Tutorial:
<size=80%><#ffffff><size=100%>Stop on red lights</size>
Only move in directions where you see a green arrow
The timers indicate when the color changes
Yellow means the light will turn red, so stop moving
Orange means the light will turn green, but do not move yet
